## Implementation Details

**Container System:**
- `.container`: Standard content container (max-width: 1200px)
  - Uses `margin-inline: auto` for centering
  - Padding from CSS custom property `--container-padding`
- `.container--wide`: Wider variant for galleries (max-width: 1400px)

**Accessibility Utilities:**
- `.visually-hidden`: Hides content visually but keeps it accessible to screen readers
  - Uses clip-path and positioning tricks
  - Follows WCAG 2.1 best practices for SR-only content
  
- `.skip-link`: Keyboard navigation helper
  - Hidden by default (translateY(-100%))
  - Appears when focused via Tab key
  - Allows users to skip to main content
  - High z-index (9999) ensures visibility
  - Styled with primary color background

**Text Utilities:**
- `.text-center`: Center-align text content

**Display Utilities:**
- `[hidden]`: Enforces `display: none !important` on elements with hidden attribute
  - Used for JavaScript-controlled visibility (modals, galleries)

**Reduced Motion Support:**
- `@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)`:
  - Respects user OS/browser preference for reduced animations
  - Reduces all animations to 0.01ms (near-instant)
  - Limits animation iterations to 1
  - Disables smooth scroll behavior
  - Critical for users with vestibular disorders or motion sensitivity
